Additional notes
The band started as Joshua then changed name in 1995 to M-Pire then in 2001 changed name to Joshua Perahia
under &#039;Joshua&#039; name the band released 3 albums:
1- the hand is quicker than the eye
2- intense defense
3- surrender
only those 3 albums was under Joshua NAME.
under M-Pire name they released 2 albums:
1-1995 (the album that exist on M-Pire MA page)
2-1995 double trouble is a cd not a split
under Joshua Perahia the band released the album
Something To Say
